caption.p: Atractylodis rhizoma and atractylodis macrocephalae rhizoma in pharmacopoeia of China, Japan and korea.

tr.td: Pharmacopoeia of the People's Republic of China
Atractylodes lancea (Thunb.) DC. or Atractylodes chinensis (DC.) Koidz.
